Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-27423 affecting package vim for versions less than 9.1.1164-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-27423 affecting package vim for versions less than 9.1.1164-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package vim is earlier than 9.1.1164-1, affected by CVE-2025-27423
